snippet: A furor is growing over reports that Australian Embassies carried out intelligence-gathering missions in several Asian nations as part of a United States-led effort.
abstract: Indonesia's Ministry of Foreign Affairs summons Australia's ambassador, Greg Moriarty, to respond to news media reports that Australia's embassy in Jakarta had carried out intelligence-gathering missions in several Asian nations as part of United States-led spying effort; says that such actions are not acceptable and has harmed its diplomatic relations with both countries.
lead_paragraph: A furor is growing over reports that Australian Embassies carried out intelligence-gathering missions in several Asian nations as part of a United States-led effort.

headline.main: Indonesia Confronts Australian Ambassador on Reports of Spying
headline.print_headline: Indonesia Confronts Australian Ambassador on Reports of Spying
